$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/notionpage-backlink/bod.title: $:/plugins/Gk0Wk/notionpage-backlink/body
$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/notionpage-backlink/bod.text:
<$list filter="[!is[draft]backlinks[]!is[draft]!is[shadow]!is[system]count[]!match[0]]" variable="backlinkCount"> <$list filter="[addprefix[$:/temp/Gk0Wk/BacklinkBox/]]" variable="stateTiddler"> <$button popup=<> class="gk0wk-backlinksbox-title" tooltip="Show backlinks">{{$:/core/images/link}} <> backlink<$reveal type="nomatch" text=<> default="1">s <$reveal type="popup" state=<> position="below" tag="div" class="tc-popup-keep gk0wk-backlinksbox-box">
Linked to <$reveal type="nomatch" text=<> default="1">these pages<$reveal type="match" text=<> default="1">this page:
<$list filter="[!is[draft]backlinks[]!is[draft]!is[shadow]!is[system]]"> <$link class="gk0wk-backlinksbox-box-link" to=<>>
<$list filter="[get[icon]]" variable="icon"> <$list filter="[titleis[shadow]]"><$transclude tiddler=<>/> <$list filter="[titleis[tiddler]]"><$transclude tiddler=<>/> <$list filter="[title!is[shadow]!is[tiddler]]"><$wikify name="rendered" text=<> output=html><>
''<$text text=<>/>''
